HMDVRDevice.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The HMDVRDevice interface of the WebVR API represents a head mounted display, providing access to information about each eye, and allowing us to modify the current field of view.

HMDVRDeviceGetEyeParameters.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The getEyeParameters() method of the interface returns current parameters for the eye specified as its argument ("left" or "right") â€” stored in a object.

remarks.para: This includes field of view information, and more.

HMDVRDeviceSetFieldOfView.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The setFieldOfView() method of the interface can be used to set the field of view for one eye, or both eyes simultaneously.
